title: Lord of the Beasts
description: The time has come to face his destiny… Enchanted blood flows through vet Donal Fleming’s veins, but life among mortal kind has left him wary and he secretly hungers for the freedom to live unrestrained by civilised society. Until Cordelia… Cordelia Hardcastle has always played by society’s rules… Until Donal introduces her to a passion she’s never dreamed of and a world she never imagined. But Donal’s attraction to Cordelia has unleashed his most primal instincts and he must face the consequences of an impossible choice – between human love and the powers that, to him, are life itself…
author: Susan Krinard
